ValidationRule.description: Require 'Local Competitor' when 'Local Competitor' is chosen in Payroll Current-Prior Method. NSS is excluded from this rule.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(RecordTypeId='012500000000nCj',RecordTypeId='01270000000UNXq',RecordTypeId='012300000000hNv'), ISPICKVAL( Current_Prior_Method__c , 'Local Competitor') , ISCHANGED(Current_Prior_Method__c), ISBLANK( Local_Competitors__c ), NOT (CONTAINS($Profile.Name , 'NSS')), NOT (CONTAINS($Profile.Name , 'System Admin')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate 'Local Competitors' field when 'Local Competitor' is chosen in the Payroll Current-Prior Method field value.
